roleset.name: remove moisture from
roleset.note: DEHYDRATE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4 . Comparison to 'dry'. Roleset (from dehydrate.01-v)
DEHYDRATION-N NOTES: Based on frame for dehydrate-v.01. Framed by Anwen March 2011 (from dehydration.01-n)

role.descr: agent, causer of loss of moisture

example.name: transitive
example.text: All this exercise and sweating has dehydrated me.

example.name: intransitive with patient
example.text: For instance, what many don't realize is that our blood gets thicker as we dehydrate which in turn increases our blood pressure (it's harder to pump mud than water).

example.name: adjectival
example.text: *PRO* Carry dehydrated food on your camping trip.

example.name: with Causer
example.text: Their dehydration of the meat allowed it to be stored over the winter.
